narrative.narrative: Singapore Airlines Cargo is the cargo division of Singapore Airlines and was founded in 2001. However it had been around since 1992 as part of Singapore Airlines but was spunoff into a seperate subsidiary in 2001. They are part of the WOW Alliance with Lufthansa Cargo and SAS Cargo Group. Besides Singapore Changi they have hubs at Sharjah,UAE, Bruseels,Belgium and Amsterdam Schipol. As of May 2014 they have 12 747-400F's and no plans to order the 747-8F. It serves 24 destinations worldwide in its own capacity and also handles all the cargo on the rest of the Singapore Airlines passenger aircraft.
